f0de386d-00e5-4e21-b05d-980381051b66:
You are skilled at dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} with one weapon. Choose one type of weapon (including {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed strike{/g}) for which you have already selected the Weapon Focus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. You deal extra damage when using this weapon.
Benefit: You gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all damage rolls you make using the selected weapon.
Special: You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new type of weapon.
